modName: Dragonborn Amulets and Bloodskal Blade 2k Retexture
summary: This Pack contains 2 High Quality Dragonborn Amulets and the Bloodskal Blade
descriptionHtml:
Who does not know the Amulets. We all know them and we have them. This small Amulett Pack is a High Qualitiy Resolution in  2k = 2048x2048 Retexture of the Dragonborn Amulets. I have improved the Colors and Contrast to make them Stand out a little bit more.This will also Improve the 3D look of these Amulets. 
As a small Bonus I have also Retextured the Blood Sword, cause I also like this Sword. The Sword also is a High Quality Retexture in 2k Resolution = 2048x2048. It is also Improved in the Colors and Contrast and for me it also feels a bit more 3D standing out now.



I just wanted to share this Mod with you, if you also like Amulets like I do.


Dragonborn DLC is Required !


This Pack contains:

1 - Bloodskal Blade ( Improved )

2 - Bera\'s Necklace ( Improved )

3 - East Empire Pendant ( Improved )

Also take a look the Screenshots !



PLEASE ENDORSE ME IF YOU LIKE IT !





CREDITS TO BETHESDA SOFTWORKS FOR THIS AWESOME GAME !

CREDITS TO NEXUS NETWORKS !!!



Thanks to all of you !

HXP


If you like you can also take a look at my other Mods !

Enjoy
author: HXP
